title: Very Luxurious 2 Bedroom Ready For Move-In, 1 Month Free!!
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1283 Sq.
Discover life in a laid-back community made for thriving, a stone’s throw from Caltrain, miles of trails and a flourishing community garden.
Perfect for you and your four-legged friend!
Relax poolside, or enjoy our available amenities.
Field House San Mateo keeps life in balance.
For virtual tours, visit our website by copying and pasting the following link into your browser: <URL>

- In-home washer and dryer, - Central heating and air conditioning, - One-, two- and three-bedroom residences, - Stunning large-format windows, - High-speed fiber optic internet, - Up to 10' ceilings in many homes, - Stainless steel appliances, plank flooring and solid surface countertops, - Flats and townhomes, - Private patios and front stoop entries, - Recessed lighting and walk-in closets

- Outdoor fire feature, barbecue facilities and dining areas, - 18 acres of surrounding parks and trails, - Heated outdoor swimming pool, - Vibrant Bay Meadows location with direct access to Town Square retail, - EV parking, personal storage and bike parking, - State-of the-art fitness center, - Package acceptance, laundry and other concierge-level services, - Walk to Whole Foods, Hillsdale Mall, Caltrain and coffee shops, - Club Room with chef's kitchen and shuffleboard table, - Pet-friendly environment
